summary: Formally close the governance process with signed authorisation and establish continuous monitoring and assurance after sharing synthetic data.
checklist: Verify all preceding assessments (Steps 1-5) have been completed.
Review the complete evidence bundle for the synthetic data project.
Obtain formal sign-off from the Data Principal (DP).
Communicate decision and conditions to all relevant stakeholders.
Establish ongoing monitoring processes for data use and access.
Review audit logs regularly for suspicious activity.
Respond to any incidents or breaches according to organizational policy.
Conduct periodic reviews of data sharing arrangements.
Confirm retention and destruction policies are followed.
